methods.generated_comment:
/**
 * This method retrieves the number of elements resulting from an advanced search query in the database.
 * The search can be performed with a keyword, a list of tags, a position, and a maximum distance.
 * If no tags are provided, the search is performed based on the keyword and position only.
 * If tags are provided, the search is performed based on the keyword, tags, and position.
 * 
 * @param pIdTurista The ID of the tourist performing the search.
 * @param pKeyword The keyword to search for in the name or description of the points of interest.
 * @param pTags The list of tags to filter the search results.
 * @param pPosizione The position from which to calculate the distance to the points of interest.
 * @param pDistanzaMassima The maximum distance within which to search for points of interest.
 * @return The number of elements resulting from the advanced search query.
 * @throws SQLException If an error occurs while executing the database query.
 */
